project.description: Apache NiFi is an easy to use, powerful, and reliable system to process and distribute data.

requireReleaseDeps.message: Dependencies outside of Apache NiFi must not use SNAPSHOT versions

property.name: message
property.value: Javadoc @see does not need @link: pick one or the other.

property.name: tokens
property.value: CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, STATIC_INIT

property.name: tokens
property.value: BAND, BOR, BSR, BXOR, DIV, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LE, LITERAL_INSTANCEOF, LOR, LT, MINUS, MOD, NOT_EQUAL, QUESTION, SL, SR, STAR
